body_html:
I think I've found a shared_ptr reference cycle:

ExecutionPlanAutogradFunction owns a vector of SharedVariable (

pytorch/torch/csrc/jit/graph_executor.cpp

Line 98 in 65d32b1

std::vector<autograd::SavedVariable> var_captures;
)

When it captures an input to save for backwards, this is called: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/graph_executor.cpp#L87. This creates a SharedVariable with a shared_ptr to the original ExecutionPlanAutogradFunction, completing the reference cycle.

Breaking the cycle should make this issue go away.
